translation.zh: ‎嗨

translation.en: -Nice to meet you. I'm Lars. -Hi.
translation.zh:
‎-幸会 我是拉尔斯
‎-嗨

translation.en: -[interviewer] Hi. How you doing? -Hi.
translation.zh:
‎-嗨 你好吗？
‎-你好

translation.en: No problem, lovely to see you.
translation.zh: ‎没问题 很高兴见到你

translation.en: Good to see you. Hi, how are you? Where do I sit?
translation.zh:
‎很高兴见到你
‎嗨 你好吗？我坐哪儿？

translation.en: So 35 people to interview, huh?
translation.zh: ‎所以要采访35个人？

translation.en: [interviewer] Yeah. At least.
translation.zh: ‎对 至少

translation.en: Is this okay?
translation.zh: ‎这可以吗？

translation.en: How much elbow room do I have?
translation.zh: ‎我有多大的活动空间？

translation.en: -[interviewer] You have full room. -Full.
translation.zh:
‎-整个房间任你活动
‎-整个

translation.en: -Gesture as much as you want. -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-随心所欲做手势
‎-好的

translation.en: So look at you and talk.
translation.zh: ‎所以看着你说话

translation.en: [Uday Chopra] Which accent should I do this in now?
translation.zh: ‎我现在该用哪种口音？

translation.en: Should I start with, like, an Indian accent?
translation.zh: ‎我应该以印度口音开始吗？

translation.en: -[Katrina] We can talk about New York. -[interviewer] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-然后我们可以聊聊《纽约》
‎-好的

translation.en: Um, we can talk about, um, Jab Tak Hai Jaan.
translation.zh: ‎我们可以聊聊《爱无止境》

translation.en: [in British accent] I could do a British accent.
translation.zh: ‎我还能说一口正宗的英式英语

translation.en: I could do the entire interview like that.
translation.zh: ‎我可以整个采访都这么说话

translation.en: Reflection. No reflection. Lot of reflection.
translation.zh: ‎反光 ‎不反光 很反光

translation.en: Or I can just talk like this.
translation.zh: ‎或者我就这么说话

translation.en: I can say controversial things as well if you like.
translation.zh: ‎要是你想的话 我可以聊有争议的事

translation.en: Couple of rumors.
translation.zh: ‎说一些流言蜚语

translation.en: [in Hindi] Don't ask me when Salman Khan will get married.
translation.zh: ‎别问我萨尔曼汗什么时候结婚

translation.en: [Sanjeev Kohli in English] Give me a minute
translation.zh:
‎好的 开机之前 给我一点时间
‎这样我可以看一遍这个

translation.en: so I run through this for a second. The first part.
translation.zh:
‎好的 开机之前 给我一点时间
‎这样我可以看一遍这个 ‎第一部分

translation.en: I don't know what I'm in for, but let's go. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎我不知道我要干什么 但我们开始吧

translation.en: [Rani Mukerji] I don't have any, like pieces, in between my teeth, right?
translation.zh: ‎我牙缝里没有食物残渣吧？

translation.en: Clean? [Saif Ali Khan] We're noisy people.
translation.zh:
‎-干净吧？
‎-我们非常吵闹

translation.en: Let's make sure that we don't open the door.
translation.zh: ‎千万不要打开那扇门

translation.en: Even on a film set. This is how you just go.
translation.zh: ‎即使是在片场 就得这么做

translation.en: Rolling?
translation.zh: ‎开机了吗？

translation.en: Check five, four, three, two, one.
translation.zh: ‎检查 五、四、三、二、一

translation.en: Yeah, now sound level.
translation.zh: ‎好 现在声级

translation.en: -Sound, one, two, three. -[vocalizes]
translation.zh: ‎声音 一、二、三

translation.en: Fantastic. Mind-boggling. Let's go.
translation.zh: ‎太棒了 不可思议 开始吧

translation.en: [in Hindi] ♪ Be your eyes shut Or wide open ♪
translation.zh: ‎不管你睁眼还是闭眼

translation.en: ♪ You see your beloved ♪
translation.zh: ‎都会看见你的挚爱

translation.en: ♪ How will I ever explain to you What love really is? ♪
translation.zh: ‎我该如何向你解释爱的真谛？

translation.en: [Ranveer Singh in English] I wanted to be an actor since as far back as I can really remember.
translation.zh: ‎从我记事起 就一直想当个演员

translation.en: There is nothing that, uh, fascinated me more than Hindi films.
translation.zh: ‎没有比印地语电影更让我痴迷的了

translation.en: [in Hindi] ♪ Be your eyes shut Or wide open ♪
translation.zh: ‎不管你睁眼还是闭眼

translation.en: ♪ You see your beloved ♪
translation.zh: ‎都会看见你的挚爱

translation.en: [in English] Just picture this, like, little, slightly overweight kid
translation.zh: ‎想象一下 一个微胖的孩子

translation.en: sitting on the floor in front of the television screen,
translation.zh: ‎坐在电视前的地板上

translation.en: um, while all the kids are playing outside, you know.
translation.zh: ‎而所有孩子都在外面玩

translation.en: I was just engrossed, besotted, fascinated, wide-eyed.
translation.zh: ‎我沉浸其中 彻底沉迷 瞪大了眼睛

translation.en: It was a very, very fascinating, uh, world for me.
translation.zh: ‎对我来说 这是个令人入迷的世界

translation.en: What are we all about?
translation.zh: ‎我们是怎样的国度？

translation.en: We're an incredible, incredible place.
translation.zh: ‎我们身处的是个难以置信的地方

translation.en: We're a country of so many cultures, so many religions.
translation.zh:
‎我们的国家融合了
‎那么多文化 那么多宗教

translation.en: There's the colors of Rajasthan, the rituals of South India,
translation.zh: ‎拉贾斯坦邦的颜色 南印度的仪式

translation.en: the magnanimity and large-heartedness of the north.
translation.zh: ‎北方的宽宏大量和博大胸怀

translation.en: [Rishi Kapoor] We're a force to reckon in the world
translation.zh: ‎就电影而言 我们绝对是

translation.en: as far as cinema is concerned.
translation.zh: ‎世界上不可忽视的力量

translation.en: We're the largest filmmaking country in the world.
translation.zh: ‎我们是世界上最大的电影制作国

translation.en: We churn out about 700 to 800 films a year.
translation.zh: ‎我们一年产出大约七八百部电影

translation.en: That's a lot.
translation.zh: ‎数量惊人

translation.en: [Shah Rukh Khan] Our cinema is as much a part of our lives in India
translation.zh: ‎在印度 电影是生活的一部分

translation.en: as much as you wake up in the morning and brush your teeth.
translation.zh: ‎它就像是早上醒来刷牙一样

translation.en: It's just an inherent part of Indians.
translation.zh: ‎它深入到了印度人的骨髓里

translation.en: They are fanatic about two things. One is cricket and one is movies.
translation.zh:
‎我们热衷于两件事
‎一是板球 二是电影

translation.en: [Abhishek Bachchan] Films that come out of India are completely unique to India
translation.zh:
‎印度产的电影对印度
‎对我们的精神、我们的文化来说

translation.en: and to our ethos and to our culture.
translation.zh: ‎是独一无二的

translation.en: And they don't try to be like anybody else.
translation.zh: ‎我们也不会尝试去模仿别人

translation.en: [Vishal Dadlani] Hindi films are known worldwide
translation.zh: ‎印地语电影因其音乐

translation.en: for their music, for their dancing, for their vibrancy,
translation.zh: ‎舞蹈、活力 以及通过美妙的音乐

translation.en: for their ability to tell a story through a beautiful melody as well.
translation.zh: ‎讲述故事的能力而享誉世界

translation.en: [Shah Rukh] There's beauty in the cinema the Indian filmmakers have stuck to
translation.zh: ‎印度电影人一直坚持电影里的

translation.en: vis-à-vis music.
translation.zh: ‎音乐美

translation.en: Or keeping it still like a musical format.
translation.zh: ‎或者保持其音乐剧的形式

translation.en: I think song and dance is so unique to India,
translation.zh: ‎我认为歌舞在印度的地位极为独特

translation.en: which is unbelievable. Like, people…
translation.zh: ‎这令人难以置信 比如 人们…

translation.en: Most of the people in the West, they don't understand what's happening.
translation.zh: ‎大多数西方人不明白是怎么回事

translation.en: "Why are they singing, and are they really singers?"
translation.zh:
‎“他们为什么唱歌
‎他们真的都是歌手吗？”

translation.en: I mean, they don't understand the concept of lip-synching or playback singing.
translation.zh: ‎他们没有对口型或事先录制的概念

translation.en: Like, in the West, if you're singing, you sing for yourself.
translation.zh:
‎比如在西方
‎如果你唱歌 就是真的在唱

translation.en: That doesn't happen in India.
translation.zh: ‎在印度并非如此

translation.en: [Madhuri Dixit] We have a very old culture.
translation.zh: ‎我们的文化源远流长

translation.en: I mean our culture is really more than 4,000 years old.
translation.zh: ‎有四千多年的历史

translation.en: [Saif] You know, plays and theater have been part of our culture
translation.zh: ‎从历史之初 话剧和舞台剧

translation.en: from the dawn of time, so we know what we're doing.
translation.zh:
‎就是我们文化的一部分
‎所以我们知道自己在干什么

translation.en: I think Indian culture has a lot, you know, in terms of style and luxury and art.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得印度文化
‎在风格、奢华和艺术上颇有建树

translation.en: Whether it's our textiles, whether it is our jewelry,
translation.zh: ‎无论是我们的服装、首饰

translation.en: whether it's the lifestyle of the prince and princesses,
translation.zh: ‎还是公主与王子及王公的

translation.en: the maharajas.
translation.zh: ‎生活方式

translation.en: [Rishi] The way the West perceives Indian cinema,
translation.zh: ‎西方看待印度电影的方式

translation.en: it's not about sadhus, it's not about…
translation.zh: ‎无关苦行僧 无关…

translation.en: -Snake charmers. -…uh, snake charmers.
translation.zh:
‎-耍蛇人
‎-…耍蛇人

translation.en: Not about elephants, and cows running.
translation.zh: ‎无关大象、奔跑的牛

translation.en: We have come a long way.
translation.zh: ‎我们已经取得了很大的进步

translation.en: [Abhishek] Today, because we have to term them as something,
translation.zh: ‎如今 因为我们不得不给它归类

translation.en: we term them as a drama, or a romance, or an action film, or a comedy,
translation.zh:
‎我们称其为剧情片、爱情片
‎动作片或喜剧

translation.en: but actually we have everything in it.
translation.zh: ‎但其实我们的电影里容纳了所有元素

translation.en: Our movies are like our food and our thalis.
translation.zh:
‎我们的电影就像我们的食物
‎像大盘菜一样

translation.en: There's a little bit of everything in it. Every emotion and every style.
translation.zh:
‎电影里什么元素都有
‎每种情绪、每种风格皆有之

translation.en: And that's what our audiences like.
translation.zh: ‎我们的观众就喜欢这样

translation.en: [in Hindi] ♪ With stars wrapped around you ♪
translation.zh: ‎星星围绕着你

translation.en: [in English] You can't play with the emotion of 1.32 billion people.
translation.zh: ‎你不能玩弄13点2亿人的情感

translation.en: That's like every seventh guy in the world is an Indian.
translation.zh:
‎差不多世界上每七个人里
‎就有一个是印度人

translation.en: We've very strong emotions.
translation.zh: ‎我们有很强烈的情感

translation.en: After sex, cinema is the only best form of entertainment in the world.
translation.zh:
‎除了性爱 电影是世界上
‎最好的娱乐方式之一

translation.en: For Indians at least.
translation.zh: ‎至少印度人如此

translation.en: [Shah Rukh] I come from a very lower middle-class family.
translation.zh: ‎我来自一个底层中产阶级家庭

translation.en: Television was hardly existent.
translation.zh: ‎几乎没人有电视机

translation.en: There was one channel. Um, the state-owned channel.
translation.zh: ‎当时只有一个频道 国有电视频道 ‎（演员 沙鲁克汗）

translation.en: And it showed a movie every Sunday.
translation.zh: ‎它每周日都会放一部电影

translation.en: [Shah Rukh] That also we would go and watch in our neighbor's house
translation.zh: ‎我们会去有电视机的

translation.en: who had a television,
translation.zh: ‎邻居家里看

translation.en: and who would, uh, graciously allow all the kids to come and sit on a dari.
translation.zh:
‎他们很慷慨地让所有孩子
‎都坐在地毯上看

translation.en: The good thing was there was no advertising between the films.
translation.zh: ‎还好电影之间没有广告

translation.en: [in Hindi] ♪ Turning to look, on your way ♪
translation.zh: ‎回头看 在你路上

translation.en: [in English] My dad used to look at the Times of India
translation.zh:
‎我爸爸以前会根据《印度时代》杂志
‎决定我们看哪部电影

translation.en: and decide which movie we're gonna watch.
translation.zh:
‎我爸爸以前会根据《印度时代》杂志
‎决定我们看哪部电影 ‎（演员 玛德胡瑞迪克西特）

translation.en: Only if it's a good review.
translation.zh: ‎只会看好评电影

translation.en: Doordarshan had started showing some black and white films
translation.zh: ‎全印电视台开始播放一些黑白电影

translation.en: and those used to fascinate me.
translation.zh: ‎而我沉迷其中

translation.en: [in Hindi] ♪ Draw closer to the curtains ♪
translation.zh: ‎靠近窗帘一点

translation.en: [in English] We would go to a movie theater rarely.
translation.zh: ‎我们很少去电影院

translation.en: Um, once a year, or something like that.
translation.zh: ‎（编剧 贾迪普索尼） ‎差不多一年一次

translation.en: [Shah Rukh] Going to theater was a very big thing.
translation.zh: ‎去电影院是件大事

translation.en: You went when it was an occasion, or it was a big film.
translation.zh:
‎你会因为特别的原因
‎或大片上映时才去电影院

translation.en: You know, there used to be black marketing of tickets.
translation.zh: ‎以前有黄牛电影票

translation.en: Guys, very under your breath, walking and standing next to you
translation.zh: ‎黄牛们会悄悄走过来 站在你身边

translation.en: and saying, "Dus ka panch, dus ka panch, dus ka panch."
translation.zh: ‎说：“5卢布卖10卢布”

translation.en: Which is like, "Five rupee ticket for ten, five for ten, five for ten."
translation.zh: ‎也是说“5卢布的票卖10卢布”

translation.en: So it used to be a big high.
translation.zh: ‎所以以前去看电影是件大事

translation.en: I'd ride back on my cycle, tell Mom, "I've managed."
translation.zh:
‎我会骑车回家跟妈妈说
‎“我搞定票了”

translation.en: Even that was a big thing, to manage a ticket for a big release or whatever.
translation.zh: ‎连搞到大片的电影票也算是大事

translation.en: [announcer in Hindi] This year's special presentation
translation.zh: ‎今年特别呈现的电影

translation.en: with the top 23 stars…
translation.zh: ‎请到了23名顶尖明星…

translation.en: [Shah Rukh in English] When I was growing up,
translation.zh: ‎我记得 我小的时候

translation.en: that there was the first multi-starrer film.
translation.zh: ‎出现了第一部多明星电影

translation.en: [announcer in Hindi] Sadhana. Raj Kumar.
translation.zh: ‎萨达那 ‎拉吉库马尔

translation.en: Shashi Kapoor.
translation.zh: ‎沙希卡普尔

translation.en: [Shah Rukh in English] Which meant that many actors, famous actors were in it.
translation.zh: ‎也就是说有很多著名演员参演

translation.en: It was made by a gentleman called Mr. Yash Chopra.
translation.zh: ‎这部电影是由雅什乔普拉拍摄的

translation.en: And, uh, it was called Waqt.
translation.zh: ‎叫《与时间赛跑》

translation.en: But in those years, directors were not public figures,
translation.zh: ‎但当时 导演不算公众人物

translation.en: actors were public figures, stars were public figures.
translation.zh: ‎演员和明星算公众人物

translation.en: So there were two, three names, uh, which used to circulate around
translation.zh:
‎所以有两三个名字
‎作为伟大的电影制作人

translation.en: as great filmmakers, or good filmmakers, or big filmmakers.
translation.zh:
‎优秀的电影制作人
‎或重要的电影制作人流传

translation.en: Actually, I'll be honest. It used to be people who make big films.
translation.zh:
‎不瞒你说
‎那些是专拍大场面电影的人

translation.en: They just looked big and beautiful.
translation.zh: ‎他们看起来是大人物 光鲜亮丽

translation.en: But Mr. Yash Chopra was one of the guys that you didn't miss a film of.
translation.zh:
‎但雅什乔普拉先生的电影
‎你不会错过

translation.en: And if it happens to be with an Amitabh Bachchan or Rajesh Khanna
translation.zh:
‎如果刚好还是跟阿米特巴巴强
‎和拉杰什卡纳演的片子

translation.en: then you didn't miss it at all.
translation.zh: ‎那你绝对不会错过

translation.en: [in Hindi] ♪ Me and you ♪
translation.zh: ‎我和你

translation.en: ♪ Me and you ♪
translation.zh: ‎我和你

translation.en: ♪ You and me ♪
translation.zh: ‎你和我

translation.en: ♪ You and me ♪
translation.zh: ‎你和我

translation.en: ♪ We're just happy meeting like this ♪
translation.zh: ‎这样见面很快乐

translation.en: [Karan Johar in English] I watched the masters.
translation.zh: ‎我看过大师作品

translation.en: I watched vintage Raj Kapoor.
translation.zh: ‎看过拉吉卡普尔的经典

translation.en: Guru Dutt, Bimal Roy and all those beautiful movies.
translation.zh:
‎（导演兼制片人 卡伦乔哈尔） ‎古鲁杜特、比马尔罗伊
‎及其所有的优秀电影

translation.en: But it was Yash Chopra's cinema that caught my eye.
translation.zh: ‎但雅什乔普拉的电影让我目不转睛

translation.en: [Karan] You absolutely know that a filmmaker has made a huge mark
translation.zh:
‎大家若把一个电影制作人的作品
‎称为“电影学院”

translation.en: when you call his cinema a "school of cinema."
translation.zh: ‎那你就知道这位电影人影响力很大

translation.en: He's done drama, he's done action.
translation.zh: ‎他拍过剧情片 拍过动作片 ‎（演员 萨尔曼汗）

translation.en: He's done every kind of film.
translation.zh: ‎他每种电影都拍过

translation.en: But for me Yash Chopra stood for romance.
translation.zh:
‎但我认为
‎雅什乔普拉是爱情片的代言人 ‎（演员 阿米尔汗）

translation.en: Whether it was Kabhi Kabhie or Chandni or Silsila.
translation.zh:
‎无论是《有时有时》
‎《月光》 还是《希尔希拉》

translation.en: [Rani] For me, Chandni and Lamhe have to be my all-time classics.
translation.zh:
‎对我而言 《月光》
‎和《一生与瞬间》是永远的经典

translation.en: Because those are the two films I grew up watching and I was mesmerized.
translation.zh:
‎我是看着这两部电影长大的
‎它们让我如痴如醉 ‎（演员 拉尼穆克吉）

translation.en: [Tanul Thakur] Something that stands out in his films is a sense of grandness.
translation.zh:
‎他的电影最大的特点
‎就是给人一种很宏大的感觉

translation.en: And not just in the way scenes were shot,
translation.zh: ‎不仅体现在镜头拍摄的方式上

translation.en: but also at a thematic level.
translation.zh: ‎还体现在主题上

translation.en: His films talk about eternal love, there's bit of destiny thrown in.
translation.zh:
‎他的电影讲述的是永恒的爱
‎带点“缘分天注定”的意味

translation.en: [Katrina] The way that Yashji portrayed his heroines was so dignified
translation.zh: ‎雅什塑造的女主角非常端庄

translation.en: and graceful, and layered.
translation.zh: ‎优雅、有层次感 ‎（演员 卡特里娜凯夫）

translation.en: [Juhi Chawla] The heroine always wore something lovely in chiffon.
translation.zh: ‎女主角总是穿着漂亮的雪纺裙

translation.en: And it was always that happy, Punjabi family, well-to-do.
translation.zh: ‎电影里的旁遮普家庭总是幸福而富裕 ‎（演员 朱希乔拉）

translation.en: [Manish Malhotra] He kind of showed a lifestyle, glamour,
translation.zh: ‎他展示了一种生活方式 一种魅力

translation.en: and I was really, really fascinated as a child.
translation.zh: ‎我小时候非常迷恋

translation.en: I would wonder, "Do people really go to a 5-star hotel to just have coffee?"
translation.zh:
‎我会想：“人们真的
‎会去五星级酒店喝咖啡吗？” ‎（服装设计 马尼什马尔霍特拉）

translation.en: [Abhishek] You would expect great music, iconic music.
translation.zh:
‎你会期待听到很棒的音乐
‎标志性的音乐

translation.en: Everything is glossy, and frothy, and beautiful.
translation.zh: ‎一切都很有光泽、轻薄精巧、很漂亮 ‎（演员 亚尼卡普尔）

translation.en: [Arjun Kapoor] I think most cinema today that is made in the commercial norms
translation.zh:
‎我觉得如今大多数
‎以商业标准制作的电影

translation.en: But in a very subdued way.
translation.zh: ‎但他们听上去并不兴奋

translation.en: And Mr. Gulshan Rai told me in a very subtle way,
translation.zh: ‎古尔山赖先生用很温和的方式跟我说

translation.en: "It may not do well."
translation.zh: ‎“票房可能不太理想”

translation.en: And now it's my test as a producer.
translation.zh: ‎这是对我制片人身份的考验

translation.en: If the picture doesn't do well, people will say,
translation.zh: ‎要是这部电影表现不好 人们会说

translation.en: "Yash doesn't know anything."
translation.zh: ‎“雅什啥都不懂”

translation.en: [Pamela] For many nights he didn't sleep,
translation.zh: ‎在电影上映前…

translation.en: before the release of the film.
translation.zh: ‎…他失眠了好几个晚上

translation.en: And then of course, Yash's first film was a hit.
translation.zh:
‎然后当然了
‎雅什的第一部电影大获成功

translation.en: [Pamela] And then, he didn't believe it when it was declared a hit.
translation.zh:
‎然后当这部电影
‎被称为大热门时 他不相信

translation.en: He was probably the most modest person in the world.
translation.zh: ‎他可能是全世界最谦虚的人

translation.en: Like, if he got an award, or an honor or something,
translation.zh: ‎如果他得了奖或荣誉之类的

translation.en: first thing he would tell me,
translation.zh: ‎他对我说的第一句话会是

translation.en: "Do you think I really deserve this?"
translation.zh: ‎“你觉得我真的配得上吗？”

translation.en: [laughing] I said, "Yes, you must go and get it."
translation.zh: ‎我说：“配得上 你必须去拿奖”

translation.en: [Tanul] You can't help but feel excited on Yash Chopra's behalf
translation.zh: ‎你会不由自主地为70年代早期的

translation.en: in the early '70s.
translation.zh: ‎雅什乔普拉感到兴奋

translation.en: He's not just a young producer, he's a young husband, he's a young father.
translation.zh:
‎他不仅是个年轻的制片人
‎还是个年轻的丈夫 年轻的爸爸 ‎（阿迪提亚 出生于1971年）

translation.en: And he's somebody who is looking forward.
translation.zh: ‎（尤代 出生于1973年） ‎他是一个总是向前看的人

translation.en: Now contrast that to the country that he finds himself in.
translation.zh: ‎现在对比一下他所处的国家的情况

translation.en: [reporter] The Pakistan Army commenced its operation to discipline the Bengali people.
translation.zh:
‎巴基斯坦陆军
‎开始对孟加拉人民进行“管教”

translation.en: [crowd chanting in Bengali] Long live Bangladesh!
translation.zh: ‎孟加拉万岁！

translation.en: [reporter in English] The government of India could not remain a silent spectator.
translation.zh: ‎印度政府不能继续做沉默的旁观者

translation.en: Situation is leading the two countries to a point of no return.
translation.zh:
‎这种局势
‎把两国逼到了没有退路的境地 ‎（巴基斯坦电台）

translation.en: All the great promises of an independent nation…
translation.zh: ‎一个独立国家的所有伟大承诺… ‎（电影记者 阿努帕玛乔普拉）

translation.en: [reporter] Pakistan launched a surprise air-strike
translation.zh: ‎巴基斯坦对印度西部指挥区的

translation.en: on Indian airfields in the western command area.
translation.zh: ‎机场发起了突然空袭 ‎（1971年 印巴战争）

translation.en: [Anupama Chopra] …those grand promises of independence, all of that was sort of souring.
translation.zh:
‎…所有实现独立的伟大承诺
‎所有这些都让人痛苦

translation.en: [Indira Gandhi] We had, first, the events in Bangladesh,
translation.zh: ‎首先 孟加拉国

translation.en: leading to the stream of refugees.
translation.zh: ‎发生的事件导致了难民潮

translation.en: Then the war, and then…
translation.zh: ‎然后是战争 之后又是…

translation.en: [Anupama] There was corruption, there was anarchy, in parts of the country.
translation.zh: ‎这个国家的部分地区非常腐败、混乱

translation.en: [in Hindi] Mujibur will win!
translation.zh: ‎穆吉布尔一定赢！

translation.en: [crowd chanting] Mujibur will win!
translation.zh: ‎穆吉布尔一定赢！

translation.en: [Anupama in English] And then of course, Emergency in 1975.
translation.zh:
‎后来当然就是
‎1975年的“紧急状态”

translation.en: [female reporter] The Allahabad High Court
translation.zh: ‎阿拉哈巴德高等法院

translation.en: found Indira Gandhi guilty of electoral malpractices.
translation.zh:
‎判定英迪拉甘地选举舞弊罪 ‎（1975年 英迪拉甘地
‎宣布国家进入“紧急状态”）

translation.en: When the Emergency was enforced,
translation.zh: ‎当实行紧急状态时

translation.en: Indira Gandhi's government assumed dictatorial powers
translation.zh: ‎英迪拉甘地政府采用独裁统治

translation.en: and crushed all dissent.
translation.zh: ‎压制异己

translation.en: Thousands of media persons were jailed and the judiciary was…
translation.zh:
‎数千名媒体人士被关进监狱
‎司法部门也…

translation.en: [Tanul] In 1975, you have the Emergency,
translation.zh: ‎1975年 国家进入紧急状态

translation.en: which gives a set of Draconian principles
translation.zh: ‎政府出台了一系列严厉的政策

translation.en: and it locks down the country.
translation.zh: ‎封锁了整个国家

translation.en: For two years, the press has no freedom at all.
translation.zh: ‎在那两年里 媒体没有任何自由可言

translation.en: -And in that climate, there is a backlash. -[Hindi song playing]
translation.zh: ‎这种环境中会出现反对的声音

translation.en: [Tanul in English] And the backlash comes in the form of the Angry Young Man,
translation.zh:
‎而这反对的声音
‎以“愤青”的形式出现

translation.en: which is modelled, to near perfection by Amitabh Bachchan.
translation.zh:
‎这个形象由阿米特巴巴强
‎塑造得近乎完美

translation.en: Overnight, the hero changed, the face of the hero changed.
translation.zh: ‎一夜之间 英雄变了 英雄的脸变了

translation.en: [Raj Singh in Hindi] Hand over the briefcase… or else…
translation.zh: ‎交出公文包…否则…

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好的

translation.en: I'll forget this briefcase full of gold, Raj Singh.
translation.zh:
‎我会忘了这个
‎装满金子的公文包 拉吉辛格

translation.en: But I won't forget you.
translation.zh: ‎但我不会忘记你们

translation.en: Here you go.
translation.zh: ‎给你们

translation.en: [Aamir Khan in English] Amitji was playing this Angry Young Man
translation.zh: ‎阿米扮演的这位愤青

translation.en: who's not the "squeaky clean" kind of a hero.
translation.zh: ‎不是那种“一尘不染”的英雄

translation.en: He would be a rebel, he would be someone who is a criminal…
translation.zh: ‎他是个叛逆者 是个罪犯…

translation.en: [in Hindi] The nozzle is aimed at your brains.
translation.zh: ‎枪口对准的是你的大脑

translation.en: [Aamir in English] …but whose heart is on the right side.
translation.zh: ‎…但他的心很善良

translation.en: [in Hindi] This isn't your plate, it has my name written on it.
translation.zh: ‎这不是你的盘子 上面写了我的名字

translation.en: Who are you?
translation.zh: ‎你是谁？

translation.en: [Karan in English] And Amitabh Bachchan became the voice of the common man.
translation.zh: ‎阿米特巴巴强成了普通人的代言人

translation.en: He became their hero, their role model that they rooted for.
translation.zh: ‎他成了他们的英雄 他们支持的榜样

translation.en: Cinema at that point of time was only Amitabh Bachchan.
translation.zh: ‎那个时候只有阿米特巴巴强的电影 ‎（演员 赫里尼克罗斯汉）

translation.en: Everything was about him.
translation.zh: ‎一切都以他为中心

translation.en: [Uday] It was, like, invariably a ritual.
translation.zh: ‎就像一种一成不变的仪式

translation.en: Like, if we went out to watch a movie as kids,
translation.zh: ‎我们小时候出去看电影…

translation.en: we'd come back home and re-enact parts of that movie.
translation.zh:
‎（演员兼制片人 雅什乔普拉之子
‎尤代乔普拉） ‎…我们会回来 重演电影片段

translation.en: [Abhishek] We never understood the emotional sub-text.
translation.zh: ‎我们不理解其中的情感潜台词

translation.en: That's something we never thought about as kids.
translation.zh: ‎小时候我们从没想过这些事

translation.en: For us it was, "Oh, my God, this is so cool."
translation.zh:
‎（演员 阿米特巴巴强之子
‎阿布舍克巴强） ‎我们只想着：“天啊 太酷了”

translation.en: [Uday] Abhishek and I used to play together as kids.
translation.zh: ‎阿布舍克和我小时候经常一起玩

translation.en: And the common fight between us was
translation.zh: ‎我们会一起争论

translation.en: who's going to be Amitabh Bachchan?
translation.zh: ‎谁来扮演阿米特巴巴强

translation.en: [chuckles] And he was like, "I'm his son."
translation.zh: ‎他说：“我是他的儿子”

translation.en: I said, "You can't every time be Amitabh Bachchan."
translation.zh:
‎我说：“你不能每次
‎都扮演阿米特巴巴强”

translation.en: Because we were crazy fans. Like, at that point,
translation.zh: ‎因为我们都是狂热粉丝 当时

translation.en: he was the superstar, right? Everybody wanted to be him.
translation.zh: ‎他是个超级巨星 每个人都想演他

translation.en: At Indiana University,
translation.zh: ‎我本科是

translation.en: where I'd gone to do my under-graduate in media studies
translation.zh: ‎在印第安纳大学读的媒体研究…

translation.en: thinking I'd get a job in Chicago, New York, as a copywriter.
translation.zh: ‎（演员 兰维尔辛格） ‎…我当时想找份文案工作

translation.en: And in my second year, uh, I was late to register for classes,
translation.zh: ‎大二那年 我上课注册晚了

translation.en: there was one seat left and it happened to be Acting I for non-majors.
translation.zh:
‎还剩下一门课可选 刚好是
‎供非专业学生选择的《表演基础》

translation.en: And on the first day, the instructor asked us
translation.zh: ‎第一天 老师让我们

translation.en: to just get up and perform something.
translation.zh: ‎起来随便表演一下

translation.en: You want to say a poem, you want to dance, just do it.
translation.zh: ‎吟诗、跳舞 什么都行

translation.en: So I was like, "Okay. Uh, got to do something I know how to do."
translation.zh:
‎所以我就想
‎“好吧 得表演点我会的东西”

translation.en: I… And I knew the words of the monologue from Deewaar.
translation.zh: ‎我知道《墙》里的独白

translation.en: [in Hindi] Your rules and your principles.
translation.zh: ‎你的规则和原则

translation.en: What good are they?
translation.zh: ‎它们有什么用？

translation.en: Your principles cannot feed you, Ravi!
translation.zh: ‎你的原则养活不了你 拉维！

translation.en: [in English] I started performing in front of the class and there was an African-American student,
translation.zh:
‎我开始在全班同学面前表演
‎班上有个非洲裔美国学生

translation.en: there was a Korean student,
translation.zh: ‎有个韩国学生

translation.en: there were people who didn't understand the Hindi language at all.
translation.zh: ‎有根本不懂印地语的人

translation.en: [in Hindi] We grew up on this footpath together.
translation.zh: ‎我们在这条路上一起长大

translation.en: But you got left behind and here I am.
translation.zh: ‎但你被抛弃了 而我走到了这步

translation.en: Today, I have buildings, properties, bank balance, bungalows, cars.
translation.zh:
‎如今 我有大楼、房产
‎银行存款、平房、汽车

translation.en: What do you have?
translation.zh: ‎你有什么？

translation.en: I have my mother.
translation.zh: ‎我有妈妈

translation.en: [in English] And they were like… [gasps] Like that.
translation.zh: ‎他们当时就这样

translation.en: You know? And I went for it. Like, I was like…
translation.zh: ‎你知道吗？而我则全情投入 我就…

translation.en: Because there is also no other way to deliver this monologue, okay? [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎因为没有其他方式来表演这段独白

translation.en: [Anupama] You can't speak about Hindi cinema without speaking about Deewaar.
translation.zh: ‎提到印地语电影 不得不说《墙》

translation.en: Deewaar was the template of the Angry Young Man.
translation.zh: ‎《墙》是“愤青”的模板

translation.en: [Rani] I think what Yash Chopra created in Deewaar
translation.zh:
‎我觉得雅什乔普拉
‎在《墙》里塑造的人物

translation.en: catapulted Mr. Bachchan to being who he became.
translation.zh: ‎成就了现在的巴强

translation.en: A lot of people thought Deewaar is an action film.
translation.zh: ‎很多人以为《墙》是一部动作片

translation.en: In Deewaar, there was only one fight.
translation.zh: ‎（编剧 沙曼罕） ‎在《墙》里 只有一场打斗戏

translation.en: Otherwise that was a film of family drama.
translation.zh: ‎除此以外 就是部家庭伦理剧

translation.en: Two brothers, mother.
translation.zh: ‎两兄弟 母亲

translation.en: [Amitabh] My early memory of Yashji is in his flashy sports car
translation.zh:
‎我对雅什早期的记忆
‎是他开着那辆华丽的跑车

translation.en: driving down Marine Drive.
translation.zh: ‎在海洋大道上行驶

translation.en: And Yashji was always looked upon as this new-age young director
translation.zh: ‎雅什一直被视为新时代年轻导演… ‎（演员 阿米特巴巴强）

translation.en: who was wanting to make different films.
translation.zh: ‎…他一直想拍摄不同的电影

translation.en: Salim-Javed suggested that Mr. Yash Chopra should direct Deewaar.
translation.zh:
‎萨利姆和贾维德建议
‎雅什乔普拉先生导演《墙》 ‎（编剧二人组 萨利姆和贾维德）

translation.en: Now Yashji, by that time, had established himself as a director
translation.zh: ‎那时的雅什已经有一定的导演名声

translation.en: who worked more in beautiful sceneries,
translation.zh: ‎人们认为他倾向于拍摄优美的风景

translation.en: objects and the beauty of nature.
translation.zh: ‎漂亮的物体和自然之美

translation.en: But Deewaar was very rugged.
translation.zh: ‎但《墙》很粗犷

translation.en: And one wondered whether he would accept to do something like this.
translation.zh: ‎这让人怀疑他会不会同意拍这部影片

translation.en: Yashji never lost his mind towards nature and towards romance
translation.zh: ‎即使是在拍摄《墙》这样的电影

translation.en: even when he was doing a film like Deewaar.
translation.zh:
‎雅什也没有放弃
‎他对自然和浪漫的追求

translation.en: So there is a shot where I've decided to go and take revenge
translation.zh: ‎有一幕我决定去报仇

translation.en: and I've put up my revolver, and I'm looking very intensely.
translation.zh:
‎我已经举起了我的左轮手枪
‎我神情严肃

translation.en: And the camera shifts and goes to a bouquet of roses.
translation.zh: ‎然后镜头转换 转到了一束玫瑰上

translation.en: I said, "Hey, Yashji, this is a very intense scene."
translation.zh: ‎我说：“嘿 雅什 这一幕很紧张

translation.en: "We're talking about bullets and things like that."
translation.zh: ‎我们要拍子弹之类的

translation.en: [chuckling] "Why are you going to a bouquet?"
translation.zh: ‎你为什么要拍一束花？”

translation.en: [in Hindi] "It looks nice."
translation.zh: ‎“它很美”

translation.en: [Tanul in English] I think marriage and becoming a father had a significant influence
translation.zh:
‎我觉得婚姻、身为人父
‎对雅什乔普拉的电影拍摄生涯

translation.en: on, uh, Yash Chopra's filmmaking life.
translation.zh: ‎产生了巨大的影响

translation.en: As it would do to perhaps to any director.
translation.zh: ‎就像对任何一位导演一样

translation.en: And you get the sense that there's the personal
translation.zh: ‎你能看得出他的个人生活

translation.en: that's beautifully melding into the professional.
translation.zh: ‎完美地融入了职业生涯中

translation.en: [Amitabh] We don't call the wife the better half without reason.
translation.zh:
‎大家把妻子称为“贤内助”
‎是有道理的

translation.en: Pam was somewhere in the background,
translation.zh: ‎帕姆在幕后

translation.en: but all her thoughts, her thinking were always in the foreground.
translation.zh:
‎但她所有的想法和见解
‎都呈现到了幕前

translation.en: Pamji was a big contributor to Yashji's, uh, success in the initial years.
translation.zh:
‎帕梅为雅什最初几年的成功
‎做出了巨大的贡献 ‎（演员 普纳姆迪隆）

translation.en: Especially when he started off on his own.
translation.zh: ‎尤其是他自立门户之初

translation.en: [Karan] She was a world woman.
translation.zh: ‎她是个见过世面的女人

translation.en: Educated, intelligent, articulate.
translation.zh: ‎有教养、有智慧、口齿伶俐

translation.en: [Anupam Kher] The kind of importance Yashji had on the set,
translation.zh: ‎帕姆乔普拉在片场外的重要性

translation.en: Pam Chopra had off the set.
translation.zh: ‎不亚于雅什在片场的重要性

translation.en: She's an automatic organizer. It's in her.
translation.zh: ‎她是天生的组织者 这是她的天赋 ‎（演员 阿努潘凯尔）

translation.en: She was the one who made sure that everybody knew everybody
translation.zh: ‎她负责让大家彼此认识… ‎（演员 卡卓尔）

translation.en: and everybody kept in touch with everybody.
translation.zh: ‎…并让大家保持联系

translation.en: [Pamela] Music is my passion, actually.
translation.zh: ‎其实我非常喜欢音乐

translation.en: Yash knew that, and invited me to attend the music sitting.
translation.zh:
‎雅什知道这一点
‎他邀请我参加音乐试听

translation.en: And slowly I became a part of that group.
translation.zh: ‎我慢慢变成了团队里的一员

translation.en: [Uday] My mother had a really good sense of music and song.
translation.zh: ‎我妈妈对音乐和歌曲很有感觉

translation.en: We have this gadda room, [chuckles] you know, in our house,
translation.zh: ‎我们家有个床垫房

translation.en: which was like the music room.
translation.zh: ‎就像音乐房一样

translation.en: And it was specifically created for a creatively inducive environment.
translation.zh:
‎是为了打造一个
‎能激发创造力的环境而专门设置的

translation.en: I remember as kids playing outside
translation.zh: ‎记得小时候 我们在外面玩

translation.en: and we heard these songs going on inside
translation.zh: ‎房间里会传出歌声

translation.en: and my mother and father would be going through different pieces of music,
translation.zh: ‎我爸妈会听各种各样的音乐

translation.en: trying to figure what fits, what doesn't fit.
translation.zh: ‎确定哪段适合 哪段不适合

translation.en: Working with a lyricist.
translation.zh: ‎跟作词人合作

translation.en: [Poonam Dhillon] And I think the credit of getting Punjabi music into the films
translation.zh: ‎我觉得将旁遮普音乐融入电影

translation.en: was partly Pam Chopraji's.
translation.zh: ‎帕姆乔普拉也有功劳

translation.en: Till today it's such an integral part
translation.zh: ‎直到今天 它仍是不可或缺的一部分

translation.en: and all the hit songs which we all dance to today
translation.zh: ‎我们现在跳舞的热门歌曲

translation.en: are having a Punjabi background.
translation.zh: ‎都蕴含着旁遮普的感觉

translation.en: [in Hindi] ♪ To self ♪
translation.zh: ‎为了自我

translation.en: ♪ The promise that was made ♪
translation.zh: ‎许下的诺言 ‎（帕梅拉乔普拉歌声）

translation.en: [Uday in English] I think once my father got married,
translation.zh: ‎我觉得我爸爸一结婚

translation.en: he was very interested in my mother's point of view.
translation.zh: ‎他就对妈妈的想法很感兴趣

translation.en: So he would always ask her, you know, what is the woman's perspective.
translation.zh: ‎他总是问她女性怎么想

translation.en: And I think you will see that change in his movies post-marriage.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得在他婚后拍摄的电影中
‎也能看到这种转变

translation.en: [Tanul in English] Having a partner by his side who's a keen, intelligent mind,
translation.zh: ‎有个敏锐、聪明的伴侣在身边

translation.en: I think, started to imbue his films, not just with a certain kind of softness,
translation.zh: ‎他开始给电影注入某种柔软的感觉

translation.en: but also with a very keen awareness about his female characters.
translation.zh: ‎以及对他片中的女性角色的敏锐认识

translation.en: In fact, she's the one who's written the story of Kabhi Kabhie.
translation.zh:
‎事实上 是她写了
‎《有时有时》的故事
